title: Allstars Fantasy
author: Allstars Fantasy
created_time: April 20, 2023, 08:13:51 AMLast edit: May 16, 2023, 04:53:51 PM by Allstars Fantasy

comments.author: Allstars Fantasy
comments.body: Welcome to Allstars Fantasy, the next-generation daily fantasy football platform built on the Polygon network! We're excited to have you join our community and experience the thrill of strategizing with your dream team.To celebrate our launch and show our appreciation, we're offering a special promotion: the first 500 users to register will receive 100 FREE AFC tokens! You can use these tokens to participate in contests on our platform or hold onto them and sell once our IDO goes live. Just send me your username and Wallet address (Polygon) and I will send AFC straight awayCheers,Saleem

comments.author: efialtis
comments.body: You are back... been a while and you never informed us (me) about the previous closure and/or responded to our messages.Anyway, best of luck!

comments.author: Allstars Fantasy
comments.created_time: April 20, 2023, 01:01:15 PMLast edit: April 20, 2023, 01:11:45 PM by Allstars Fantasy
comments.body: Quote from: efialtis on April 20, 2023, 10:57:25 AMYou are back... been a while and you never informed us (me) about the previous closure and/or responded to our messages.Anyway, best of luck! haha yeah sold it to an Armenian Casino owner who wanted something quick (even though it wasn't particularly successful  ) he was an industry veteran apparently so much better than me at running a casino.Allstars Fantasy though is my baby! thanks for the wishes...check it out when you have time!

comments.author: Allstars Fantasy
comments.body: Hey AllstarsWe are excited to announce that Allstars Fantasy, a cutting-edge fantasy football platform built on the Polygon blockchain, is giving away 100 FREE AFC tokens to the first 500 users who register!AFC is our in-game utility token that you can use to join pools, receive rewards, and make the most of our platform. This is your chance to be an early adopter and secure FREE tokens to kickstart your Allstars Fantasy journey.Here's a quick rundown of what Allstars Fantasy offers:Participate in public or private pools.Create your dream team with players from Europe's top football leagues.Compete and earn AFC tokens as rewards.Don't wait any longer! Register now to secure your spot and claim your 100 FREE AFC tokens. This limited-time offer is available to the first 500 registrations only, so act fast!ðŸ‘‰ app.allstarsfan.com/registerJoin us today and experience the future of fantasy football on the Polygon blockchain. We can't wait to welcome you to the Allstars Fantasy community!Happy gaming!

comments.author: entebah
comments.body: i just trying to register but i don't see any way to put in my own password, I have been trying this for 2 days but still can't input my password. after I click the link that I received in my email then it just go to login page which is impossible for me to login because I still don't create my own password.

comments.author: Mahdirakib
comments.body: Quote from: Allstars Fantasy on April 20, 2023, 01:01:15 PMhaha yeah sold it to an Armenian Casino owner who wanted something quick ~Allstars Fantasy! Were you the owner of Allstarsbet101? Now you have come here with your new project. Is the Allstars Fantasy still in beta mode?Quote from: entebah on April 21, 2023, 05:01:32 PM~snip~They aren't asking to set the account password during registration. The email confirmation message link is indeed redirecting to the login page. There is no way to login without the password. Even the password reset option isn't working. Perhaps, OP hasn't completed the development of the website yet.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: Quote from: Mahdirakib on April 21, 2023, 05:28:28 PMQuote from: entebah on April 21, 2023, 05:01:32 PM~snip~They aren't asking to set the account password during registration. The email confirmation message link is indeed redirecting to the login page. There is no way to login without the password. Even the password reset option isn't working. Perhaps, OP hasn't completed the development of the website yet.I think it doesn't require a password to enter just like some casinos use a system without a password, but it's true it looks like the OP hasn't finished their website perfectly, even though they wrote the first 500 registrants will get 100 free AFC tokens while the people who see this thread certainly will rush to register so finally have to report this that it looks like the website hasn't worked perfectly the link sent by the email doesn't lead to confirmation of registration.I also tried registering with email I thought I only got a link in the email, a kind of confirmation to enter the account, it turned out to be redirected to enter using the email and password, that's really strange, I didn't even see the password when registering, only the email field and referral code, BTW site it's a bit heavy to access via a cellphone browser it seems this site is not very cellphone friendly so I have to access it using my laptop. I'd like to take a deeper look at your site, waiting for the next update for the registration issue hope the OP resolves it quickly.

comments.author: klidex
comments.body: The appearance of your site is very attractive and friendly to use on cellphones and desktops.I see your AFC token is based on the Polygon network which has lower fees and this is very profitable for gamblers who want to try this fantasy game.Actually, I started registering yesterday, it's just that right now I don't really have the desire to try betting here, but I'll wait for the experiences of other members, if they share good experiences, maybe I'll try it soon too.By the way welcome to the forum and glad to see you are here to bring a very interesting fantasy game.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Has anyone here being able to successfully register an account in their website? I go confused when the registration page didn't prompt me to input any password they only just sent me an email but on clicking on the link, I was redirected to the login page but this time they asked for my password. I'm still not sure why OP would ask us to register an account in a website that is yet to be completed. I don't want to start thinking that Op has an utterior motive behind this but well since we went asked to connet to anything I guess there is nothing to be scared of, for now.

I go confused when the registration page didn't prompt me to input any password they only just sent me an email but on clicking on the link, I was redirected to the login page but this time they asked for my password. I don't want to start thinking that Op has an utterior motive behind this but well since we went asked to connet to anything I guess there is nothing to be scared of, for now.I have been trying it for 3 days straight and until now I don't see any way to input my password to log in.i even tried on other browsers but until now still not works and all we can do now is waiting for the OP to fix this problem.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: What's up with the registrations I have been unable to create an account on the casino even though the website looks so attractive, am glad to have seen how active ops have been and hopefully, he will answer to this one because I can see one or two other members complain same. But let me join the existing protocol to welcome you to the forum and hopefully, we will be having a good time going forward so once again welcome.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: am I doing something wrong, I can't seem acces the website. after clicking the image on your original post or even doing it manually to access the website, I only see the all-star fantasy logo on your website and the icon to your support and nothing else(image below). any Idea why? I'm from the Philippines, is my country restricted or is the website under maintenance?

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: OP, if I may ask is the website still under development or maintenance because I tried getting registered but to no avail. The process is a kind of frustrating for a new project looking for more participants. If this is not looked into you might end up loosing participants as the process is not clear.Â Having said all these.Never the less, as I checked, you are a new bie and would like to say congratulations and welcome to the platform.

comments.author: QueenVera
comments.body: Welcome back and you came back brighter and more beautiful.I guess the site is down for maintaince because I tried registering an account but it wasn't opening on my Android device so I would want to plead that you also put the android version of your Casino into consideration so I wouldn't have to miss out of the welcome bonus because I love bonuses.I know you're not new to this industry but please try to have a very active customer support term because with this your welcome bonus, I pretty sure yo should be expecting a handful of complains and messages coming in for assistance and everyone would want to attended to at once .
